duties_responsibilities.duty: Elicit, analyze, document, and validate system behavior and project management principles.
Manage business partner relationships to drive satisfaction with IT and coordinate project delivery.
Collaborate with multiple teams to identify, document, and communicate business needs and provide technology solutions.
Perform current state analysis of existing business systems, applications, data, and functions.
Mentor and coach less senior BSA team members and demonstrate an Agile BSA mindset.
Manage multiple projects, activities, and tasks under time constraints and anticipate change.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in computer science or related technical discipline (Master's preferred)
